de.weltraumschaf.dht.cmd

Class CommandFactory

  • java.lang.Object
    • de.weltraumschaf.dht.cmd.CommandFactory

  • public final class CommandFactory
extends Object
    Factory to create command objects depending on the parsed ShellCommand.
    Author:
    Sven Strittmatter

      • createClassLookup

        private static Map<de.weltraumschaf.commons.shell.MainCommandType,Class<?>> createClassLookup()
                                                                                       throws ClassNotFoundException
        Creates the command type class lookup. Must never be more visible than private, unless remaining not final because used in constructor.
        Returns:
        never null or empty, unmodifiable map
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - if a command class is not found

      • getDescriptors

        static Collection<Descriptor> getDescriptors()
                                      throws ClassNotFoundException,
                                             InstantiationException,
                                             IllegalAccessException
        Get sorted list of all command descriptors. Sorting is done by the literal command.
        Returns:
        never null, unmodifiable
        Throws:
        ClassNotFoundException - if a command class is not found
        InstantiationException - if command can't be instantiated
        IllegalAccessException - if default constructor is not accessible

                             throws IllegalAccessException,

      • newCommand

        public Command newCommand(de.weltraumschaf.commons.shell.ShellCommand shellCmd)
                   throws InstantiationException,
                          IllegalAccessException
        Create command instances according to the parsed shell command. This method also injects Application and list of arguments.
        Parameters:
        shellCmd - used to determine appropriate command
        Returns:
        command object
        Throws:
        InstantiationException - if command can't be instantiated
        IllegalAccessException - if default constructor is not accessible CHECKSTYLE:OFF
        IllegalArgumentException - if, can't create command of bad main or sub command type CHECKSTYLE:ON
